results.title: The anti-diabetic drug metformin inhibits vascular endothelial growth factor expression via the mammalian target of rapamycin complex 1/hypoxia-inducible factor-1alpha signaling pathway in ELT-3 cells.
results.text_hl: These results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may represent an effective alternative in the future treatment of @<m>DISEASE_150699</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:150699 @@@uterine leiomyomas@@@.
